page.title: 01MORDIFORD - ENVIRONMENT 1
page.content: Mordiford is well within the sphere of influence of Hereford _ which is the major service & shopping centre for the surrounding area. Farmers use the livestock market in Hereford to purchase & dispose of cattle & other animals (it is one of the major markets in the West Midlands). Many people commute from the Mordiford area into Hereford,including children who have left the village primary school, & go into Hereford for their secondary education. The other significant services that Hereford provides are sport, entertainment, medical facilities & transportation away from the immediate area.
